item.description: Summary Detailed Notes 3 IV Requirements IV must have a direct influence on the treatment IV must not covary with the unmeasured confounding that impacts the outcome IV must not have a direct influence on the outcome Relevant considerations for deciding whether to do an IV analysis Is there any unmeasured confounding?
